document.masterDocTitle: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

subSubSection.paragraph: 16 species are included in this genus from South America.
Other regions: Nearctic, Palaearctic, Ethiopian, Australian.

subSubSection.paragraph: 7 species are included in this genus from Latin America.
